org.usfirst.frc4904.standard.commands.motor

Class MotorEncoderSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Command
      • org.usfirst.frc4904.standard.commands.motor.MotorSet
        • org.usfirst.frc4904.standard.commands.motor.MotorEncoderSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.NamedSendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDOutput, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class MotorEncoderSet
extends MotorSet
implements edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDOutput
    This class handles speed based PID in a similar way to motor set.

    • Method Detail

      • tryCastMotor

        public static MotorEncoderSet tryCastMotor(Motor motor)
        This will attempt to return a constructed MotorEncoderSet from a motor you are not sure of. Please make sure you check null after using this function. There will not be an error if the motor is not and EncodedMotor.
        Parameters:
        motor -
        Returns:
